sources.title: Cops
sources.description: A series of mishaps manages to make a young man get chased by a big city's entire police force

sources.title: Buster Keaton's "Cops" (1922)
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems     "Cops" is a short comedy, starring Buster Keaton and featuring Joe Roberts, a star of Silent Hall of Fame.  The film is full of hilarious moments and demonstrates Buster Keaton's extraordinary athletic abilities.  "Cops" was added to the National Film Registry in 1997 as being deemed "culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant". Directed by               Eddie Cline, Buster Keaton Produced by             Joseph Schenck Scenario by               Eddie Cline, Buster Keaton       Starring                     Buster Keaton, Joe Roberts, Virginia Fox Cinematography        Elgin Lessley Distributed by           First National Pictures Inc. Release date               March, 1922 Running time             18 min. Country                      United States Language                    Silent film, English intertitles Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976: "Allowance is made for "fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Non-profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favor of fair use."

sources.title: Cops (Buster Keaton)
sources.description: This is the Internet Archives copy of the Buster Keaton silent classsic, Cops to which I have added a music track.

sources.title: Buster Keaton:The Genius Destroyed By Hollywood
sources.description: A spotlight on the 7 years during which his life changed, using extracts of Keaton’s films as magnifying mirrors, the film recounts the dramatic life of this creative genius and the Hollywood studios.

metadata.Plot: Through a series of mistaken identities Buster winds up with a load of furniture in the middle of parade of policemen. An anarchist's bomb lands in his carriage. After lighting his cigarette with it, he tosses it into the ranks of police. When it explodes the police chase him all over town.
metadata.Actors: Buster Keaton, Edward F. Cline, Virginia Fox
